entry.name: consoleLoggingLevel
entry.comment: Logging level used when writing output logs to the console window

entry.name: fileLoggingLevel
entry.comment: Logging level used when writing output logs to files

entry.name: groups
entry.comment: List of Jini groups used in Lookup

entry.name: thorBranch
entry.comment: Name of branch holding Athena config information

entry.name: thorName
entry.comment: Name of thor instance holding Athena configuration

entry.name: ui
entry.comment: Specifies use a small monitor GUI - either 'clean' or 'lights'
